result.execSummary:
The defendant Kenesha M. Serrano was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Jason Zapf appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Hilary Edwards.  Clerk: MHerr.
MINUTES:  2:18pm-  Matter is resolved.  Defendant entered a plea of no contest; found guilty by the court.  Court orders a $200.00 fine plus costs.  Bond on deposit to be applied, remaining balance due in 30 days or civil judgment.  NO DNA SURCHARGE.  Appeal rights given.
2:54pm-  Attorney Edwards request expungement.  Matter may be expunged if the DE does not violate any state or federal laws for a period of 6 months from the disposition of this case.
Notice of Hearing returned for Ruperto R Serrano.  Insufficient Address.  Unable to forward.
Attorney Edwards is requesting 8/20/2015 Final pre-trial be rescheduled - DE is in custody in the Lake Co Jail.  Final pre-trial is rescheduled to 9/30/2015 at 2pm.  NTBS by the Court.

Attorney Jason Zapf appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared by Attorney Hilary Edwards.  No appearance by the Defendant.  Clerk: MHerr.
MINUTES:  4:42pm-  Attorney Edwards advises the court that the DE is unable to find transportation to Kenosha from Green Bay today.  DE is expecting to have funds after 7/8/2015 to either purchase a vehicle or a bus ticket.  Court adjourns matter.  If DE is not present at the next hearing, Court may consider taking action on the DE's non-appearance.  Final pre-trial adjourned to August 20, 2015 at 02:30 pm.  Bond continued.

ADDRESS INFO for Kenesha M. Serrano

Prior: Lka: 2607 63rd Street, Kenosha, WI 53143
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
